participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and outdoorsy, with a passion for exploring nature.
participant_1.background: i'm a huge coffee lover. my father was a construction worker. i hate the color pink. i do not drink alcohol. i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and sociable, with a penchant for cars and fitness.
participant_2.background: i work from home. i like to spend my money on cars. i've never had a steady relationship. i watch too much tv in spare time. i go to the gym most days just to socialize.

content.text: Buongiorno! Such a nice day! How are you?
